name: Health Solutions
specialty: Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Health Solutions is a Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Pueblo, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $118.6M in Medicaid payments across 679K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $118.6M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,828 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
